docs.snippet: Texas executed convicted murderer Anthony Doyle on Thursday as it kept the pace of executions steady while other states have had to postpone capital punishments because they cannot obtain drugs used in lethal injections....

docs.snippet: As early as late May, directors are expected to reverse longstanding policy and vote to use toll money and federal and state funds for a suicide barrier....
docs.lead_paragraph: As early as late May, directors are expected to reverse longstanding policy and vote to use toll money and federal and state funds for a suicide barrier.
docs.abstract: Directors of the Golden Gate Bridge in San Francisco are expected to reverse longstanding policy and vote in favor of using toll money and state and federal funds to build a suicide barrier on the bridge; move comes as suicide rates have increased.

headline.main: Suicides Mounting, Golden Gate Looks to Add a Safety Net
headline.print_headline: Suicides Mounting, Golden Gate Looks to Add a Safety Net
